SEARCH
Package main

Class Match

java.lang.Object
main.Match
public class Match extends Object
This class represents a Match between the player's team and another team of Athletes. The outcome of a Match is determined by this class.
Author:
Stephen Huang, Jasmine Ong

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Match(String name, int prize, int points)
    Constructor for a Match, this object is displayed in the StadiumScreen as an option in a list of Matches.

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match(String name, int prize, int points)
      Constructor for a Match, this object is displayed in the StadiumScreen as an option in a list of Matches.
      Parameters:
      name - string of the opponent team
      prize - the amount awarded to player upon victory
      points - the amount of season points gained upon victory

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Return the name of the opposing team. Used by the MatchGenerator to assign a name to the team of athletes generated.
      Returns:
      opponentName string

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the opposing team to the specified string.
      Parameters:
      name -

      public int getPlayerScore()
      Returns the score of the player, used at the end of match to compare with opponent.
      Returns:

      Set the player's score equal to the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      playerScore - the player's score

    • getOpponentScore

      public int getOpponentScore()
      Get score of the opposing team, used at the end of match to compare with player.
      Returns:
      opponentScore int

      Set the score of the opponent to the specified amount.

    • getPrizeMoney

      public int getPrizeMoney()
      Get the amount of money to be awarded in the event of a player win.
      Returns:
      prizeMoney int

    • setPrizeMoney

      public void setPrizeMoney(int amount)
      Set prizeMoney equal to the int amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - int the number to set prizeMoney to

    • createPrizeString

      public String createPrizeString(int amount)
      Returns a given amount of money in a new format. For example 1,000,000 rather than 1000000. Used to create a String for money that is more readable.
      Parameters:
      amount - int the number to be formatted
      Returns:
      money string with comma between every 3 digits

    • getPointGain

      public int getPointGain()
      Returns the amount of season points to be awarded in the event of a player victory.
      Returns:
      int number of points

    • setPointGain

      public void setPointGain(int pointGain)
      Set the number of points to be awarded equal to an int pointGain
      Parameters:
      pointGain - int

    • getOutcome

      public String getOutcome()
      Gets the outcome of the Match, represented as a string
      Returns:
      outcome string

    • setOutcome

      public void setOutcome(String outcome)
      Sets the result of the Match to the string outcome
      Parameters:
      outcome - string

    • runMatch

      public void runMatch(GameManager incomingManager, Match match)
      This method runs and determines the outcome of a Match. It takes information from the GameManager and uses AthleteGenerator to create the opposing team. Then each Athlete from the teams will face off against their respective position on the opposing team, for example Striker vs Striker.
      Parameters:
      incomingManager - the GameManager
      match - the Match
